channel.title: How to add objects in the game
channel.description: hi, do you know how to add objects in a 508 ive got the object list but not the command to do that any1? knows?

item.title: How to add objects in the game
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“Prima, post:7, topic:248456”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=327516.msg2564466#msg2564466 date=1228336135]
I posted this on another topic:

Ok noob…Check this out.

Search for: public void NewObjects() {

Underneath that you will see something like this:

makeGlobalObject(3224, 3398, 2366, -3, 10);// signpost makeGlobalObject(3095, 3471, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3095, 3472, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3096, 3468, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3096, 3472, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3097, 3472, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks

Probably more than just that but add another one of those to that list. This is how it works:

makeGlobalObject(XCoord, YCoord, ObjectID, DirectionOfObject(0, -1, -2, -3), 10);// DescriptionOrNameOfObject

[ul][li]Save[/li]
[li]Compile[/li][/ul]

You’re done…

[/quote]

He is asking how to Create objects on a 508 server, not 317.[/quote]

I was editing my post just as you said that

Read full topic
item.source: How to add objects in the game

item.title: How to add objects in the game
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:6, topic:248456”]I posted this on another topic:

[quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=327520.msg2564463#msg2564463 date=1228336031]
Ok noob…Check this out.

Search for: public void NewObjects() {

Underneath that you will see something like this:

makeGlobalObject(3224, 3398, 2366, -3, 10);// signpost makeGlobalObject(3095, 3471, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3095, 3472, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3096, 3468, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3096, 3472, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3097, 3472, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks

Probably more than just that but add another one of those to that list. This is how it works:

makeGlobalObject(XCoord, YCoord, ObjectID, DirectionOfObject(0, -1, -2, -3), 10);// DescriptionOrNameOfObject

[ul][li]Save[/li]
[li]Compile[/li][/ul]

You’re done…
[/quote][/quote]

He is asking how to Create objects on a 508 server, not 317.

item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I posted this on another topic:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:6, topic:248462”]Ok noob…Check this out.

Search for: public void NewObjects() {

Underneath that you will see something like this:

makeGlobalObject(3224, 3398, 2366, -3, 10);// signpost makeGlobalObject(3095, 3471, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3095, 3472, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3096, 3468, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3096, 3472, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks makeGlobalObject(3097, 3472, 6472, -3, 10);// chunks

Probably more than just that but add another one of those to that list. This is how it works:

makeGlobalObject(XCoord, YCoord, ObjectID, DirectionOfObject(0, -1, -2, -3), 10);// DescriptionOrNameOfObject

[ul][li]Save[/li]
[li]Compile[/li][/ul]

You’re done…[/quote]

EDIT: Oops you said a 508 server…I don’t know if that will be the same…Whatever
